text: Lily was born on the 2nd of January
three weeks later my husband went down
to do the normal morning feed and found
Lily collapsed my immediate response was
oh my gosh I'm gonna lose her so there i
sat crying actually in tears
thinking I was going to lose this little
girl and she got taken down to the Swan
Cipolla Brittany clinic in
Wellingborough where she's remained
there for the day in critical condition
she came home with me and I was doing
physio every hour with Lily just
determined that Lily was not going to
fail I just didn't want to lose her she
is that precious Lily now thinks
obviously that I'm her mum which
obviously I am her mum at the moment and
with feeding every four hours stares she
can see she's very tiny for her age
changing nappies regularly which the
dogs to have a delight with as well she
really does think she's a dog yeah she
sir but she plays with the dogs
unfortunately does headbutt them but
they are great though don't mind at all
she'll play with the toys she leaps over
all the dogs yes she is doing morality
considering Lily came from unable to sit
stand or walk to now actually doing goat
behavior and jumping and leaping now I'm
still amazed you know when you have to
pinch yourself to think well actually I
noticed some people they'll just say
she's a go but she's actually more than
lies that she she's really special
aren't you
